com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners

Class BasicProjectileSpawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.Weapon
      • com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.BasicProjectileSpawner

  • public class BasicProjectileSpawner
extends Weapon
    This class is used to create simple projectile spawners that just fire a projectile at a target position

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPos, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 targetPos)
      Spawns a projectile in the direction of a target, also updates the last time a projectile was spawned to limit fire rate.

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public void attack(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnPos,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 targetPos)
        Spawns a projectile in the direction of a target, also updates the last time a projectile was spawned to limit fire rate.
        Specified by:
        attack in class Weapon
        Parameters:
        spawnPos - The position the projectile will be spawned from in meters
        targetPos - The target posiion the projectile will be launched towards in meters
